job.title: Data Analyst

when they choose to work with the people of Dover Food Retail brbremstrongJob Title strongData AnalystbrbrstrongLocationstrong Conyers GAbrbrstronguWhat were looking forbrbrustrongWe are looking for an innovative and experienced data analyst to join our team The data analyst will work closely with business leaders to provide information to reduce quality costs and improve processes To be successful as a quality analyst you should have a strong background working with data and proven ability to demonstrate strong attention to detail along with strong analytical and problemsolving skills The ideal candidate must be able to interpret and implement quality assurance data standards and provide accurate and comprehensive feedback to the business You will be responsible for managing extracting transforming reporting and visualizing data from a wide variety of sources as it relates to the performance of our products services and key business processesbrbrstronguWhat youll be value communicating findings and recommended actions across the entire company in an international environment Work with business leaders to identify opportunities for improvementliliCreate reports
